title: Philippe Gilbert Applauds Pogačar’s Panache: ‘He Wins with Style, not Like the Froome Era’
content:
Ex-pro turned pundit for Eurosport predicts quick Giro d'Italia knock-out blow: 'He will try to smash them early.'

Read the full article at Philippe Gilbert Applauds Pogačar’s Panache: ‘He Wins with Style, not Like the Froome Era’ on Velo.
author: ahood
